1069220.name: Miniturn
1069220.description:
Miniturn is a turn-based multiplayer game.
The goal of the Miniturn project is to create a unique turn-based experience.
Miniturn is currently still under development by two developers who're still in school.
So updates may not appear as often as for other games.
If you want to support us and motivate us to work harder, you can do so by simply leaving us a review.
We love seeing other people play the game we put so much time and effort into.

KEY FEATURES


  • Unique turn based gameplay.
  • Both player turns play out at the same time, forcing you to think about your opponents next move.
  • Your mana is also your health, mana management is the key to winning your matches.
  • Procedurally generated maps force you to explore in every match.

COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

We're developing this game together with our community. Join us on Discord
to influence the future of the game, and tell us all about your experience with Miniturn :D

STRATEGIZE

Miniturn with its unqiue features is the perfect breeding ground for amazing strategies.
Come join us and show us what you can do with these mechanics.

EXPLORE

The world of Miniturn is procedurally generated to make every match unique.
And coming soon there will be fog of war, really pushing you to explore this unqiue terrain.
